definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Despite their importance, black boxes use technology that is hardly state-of-the-art.
sentences.chinese: 但儘管它們如此重要，黑匣子採用的卻並非最新技術。

sentences.english: EU proposes 'black boxes' for buses and taxis.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟擬爲公交車輛裝“黑匣子”。

sentences.english: The application is much like a black box, with no granularity available outside it.
sentences.chinese: 應用程序很像一個黑匣子，沒有粒度可用於外部。

sentences.english: Could China wipe out an American military advantage with a simple black box?
sentences.chinese: 中國能夠僅僅用一個黑匣子就摧毀美國的軍事優勢嗎？

sentences.english: Second black box of crashed Germanwings A320 to be transported to Paris.
sentences.chinese: 墜毀的德翼A320第二個黑匣子將運抵巴黎。

sentences.english: A "black box" warning is the most serious type of warning on prescription drug labeling.
sentences.chinese: “黑匣子”警告是處方藥標籤上最嚴重的警告類型。

sentences.english: The composites are applying to the demand for high performance fire proofing and thermal insulation of black-boxes at high temperature.
sentences.chinese: 該材料適用於黑匣子的防火高溫高效絕熱要求。

sentences.english: Some advocacy groups oppose putting black boxes in cars.
sentences.chinese: 一些隱私權利團體反對在汽車上裝設黑匣子。

sentences.english: But is the black box intended to stop HARM so dangerous?
sentences.chinese: 但是，用來攔截HARM的黑匣子真有這麼危險嗎？

sentences.english: While I was keeping thinking ofr the good things in the shop, I woke up.
sentences.chinese: 心裏惦着黑匣子裏的好東西，在夢裏我醒了。

definition: (of a plane, ship etc) to have an accident (plane crash, shipwreck, vehicle collision etc)/to mess things up
transponder/electronic device that responds to a radio code
pinyin: yi4 pin2 lei2 da2 shou1 fa1 ji1
